name: Tortilla Creek (Lower)
description:
Introduction

The lower section of Tortilla Creek features some nice pools, wooded areas and often enough has some nice, flowing water; though it is quite brushy in a few sections. The most simple way to visit this section is to hike directly up the creek from Tortilla Flat, then back the way you came.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
